law.text: Before a promoter license is granted to any person to hold or promote boxing, kickboxing, mixed martial arts, or wrestling shows or exhibitions, the applicant shall file with the authority a bond in the sum of five thousand dollars ($5,000), to be approved as to form and the sufficiency of the sureties by the authority, conditioned for the payment of the taxes, fines or any fees imposed by the authority. Upon the approval of the bond, the authority shall issue to the applicant a certificate of filing and approval.
